name: Daily Crypto Bollinger-RSI Mean Reversion
description: Mean-reverting crypto strategy trading daily bars on BTCUSD and ETHUSD. Long entries when price closes below the lower 20-day Bollinger Band and RSI(14)<30; shorts when price closes above the upper band and RSI(14)>70. Exits at the 20-day SMA or RSI back to 50. Risk managed with 1.5 % fixed stop-loss, 2 % take-profit, and position sizing that risks no more than 2 % of account equity per trade.
